rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry with eco-friendly natural stone flooring and minimalistic decor, ensuring a welcoming atmosphere.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the front to maximize natural light. Features indoor plants and energy-efficient LED lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, featuring a large dining table made from sustainable materials. Natural ventilation is ensured by strategically placed openings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and proper ventilation. Utilizes natural light through skylights for better energy conservation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom located on the ground floor to adhere to Vastu principles of having separate guest quarters in a corner plot design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with private balcony. Utilizes natural light and energy-efficient design, ensuring tranquility and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom with water-saving fixtures and ample ventilation, following eco-friendly practices.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring abundant natural light and ventilation.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Area

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Quiet room for children, designed with ample storage and eco-friendly furniture.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another child bedroom offering space for creativity and study, following Vastu principles of placement for harmony.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Well-lit study room with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light. Uses energy-efficient lighting fixtures and sustainable materials.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Additional)
rooms.description: Alternative master bedroom on the upper level, designed with natural ventilation and eco-friendly features.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom with water-saving fixtures adhering to sustainable design norms.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.location: Between Study Room and Child Bedrooms

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Eco-friendly rooftop terrace designed with sustainable greenery, offering a relaxing space with panoramic views. Equipped with solar panels and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Provides safe and energy-efficient access to the rooftop terrace.
